extendedInfo.description: "NPM InSight" is the latest app by the National Palace Museum. After downloading, you may browse collections of ceramics, jades, bronzes, curios, paintings, calligraphy, rare books and document on your smart phone, tablet. NPM InSight is offering Chinese, English and Japanese interfaces.âTimeline: An overview of the NPM's important cultural objects covering thousands of years.â Permanent Exhibitions: Provides exhibit information, including introductions, locations, QR code navigation, pictures of and texts about cultural objects.â Museum Tours: Enjoy visit routes that are prearranged or in which you pick and choose what you want to see to better enjoy cultural objects.â Interactive Games: Interactive games (Video Puzzle and Treasure Hunt AR) to further enrich your experience.â More Info: The latest information, such as "About NPM", "Hours & Admission", "Floor Plans", "About the App" and "Other Apps".Exhibit info and content of cultural objects will be updated in accordance with the latest exhibition.

reviews.title: Good to use
reviews.comment: It\'s really fancy and interesting with lot of functions. Two thumbs up!
reviews.author: Ted Chao
